term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - median narcotic dose (ND50)
term.title: median narcotic dose

item.text: Statistically derived dose of a substance expected to cause narcosis in 50% of test animals under a defined set of conditions.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 2003. 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in toxicology (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 2068 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365092003)
